column2: ## Alternatively, trees can be represented by squares
# (these tiles cover the red lines. You could re-order the layer so that lines are on top)
geom_tile(data = holst.subset, aes(fill = group), col = "black") + # experimental trees
geom_text(data = holst.subset, aes(label = Genet), col = "black", size = 2.5, nudge_y = .1) + # label them
